summary: Completed comprehensive testing of newly added WhatsApp order tracking features: Dashboard task cards, payment term display, external URL links, and responsible user assignment functionality

minor_issues.issue: Role-based filtering for showroom users shows some non-showroom orders
minor_issues.impact: Minor - showroom users can see some orders they shouldn't

passed_tests: Dashboard displays 'Kargo Barkodu Yazdırılmamış' card with correct count (6)
Dashboard displays 'Bana Atanan Siparişler' card with correct count (1)
Dashboard cards are clickable and navigate to filtered orders
Backend API supports cargo_barcode_not_printed and my_assigned_orders stats
Order filtering works with my_orders=true parameter
Order filtering works with cargo_barcode_status parameter
User assignment functionality works (assigned_user_id and assigned_user_name fields)
Payment term functionality works (payment_term_days and payment_start_at fields)
External URL functionality works for manual order items
All new dashboard stats are visible to appropriate user roles
Backend API endpoints return correct data for new features
Order creation with user assignment works correctly
Order creation with payment terms works correctly
Manual items with external URLs are saved and retrieved correctly
